<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.sla" name="Service level management" state="published" help="CSHelp:Service-Level-Management" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="false" trackable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.workflow"/> <import plugin="com.glide.schedules"/> <import plugin="com.glide.relative_duration"/> </requires>
<description>Provides the core SLA functionality. SLA Definitions provide conditions to start, pause, stop, cancel and reset Task SLAs against any Task type. In addition, you can specify a schedule on the definition to define the working hours and also a workflow to run against each Task SLA which is typically used to generate notifications.</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Provides the core SLA functionality. SLA Definitions provide conditions to start, pause, stop, cancel and reset Task SLAs against any Task type. In addition, you can specify a schedule on the definition to define the working hours and also a workflow to run against each Task SLA which is typically used to generate notifications.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Service-Level-Management</help> <id>com.snc.sla</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Service level management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.sla/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.workflow,com.glide.schedules,com.glide.relative_duration</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.sla</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
